tool_description: Calculates SLA compliance metrics, escalation rates, and performance indicators for tickets within specified time ranges and filters.

customer_tiers.description: Customer tiers to include in analysis

include_escalated_only.description: Whether to analyze only escalated tickets

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps.
Invalid customer tiers: Customer tiers must be from [basic, premium, enterprise]. Check tier specifications.
Invalid priority levels: Priority levels must be from [low, medium, high, critical]. Verify priority values.
Date range too large: Analysis period cannot exceed 365 days. Reduce the time range for better performance.
usage: Specify date range and filters to calculate performance metrics. Use customer_tiers and priority_levels to focus analysis on specific segments.

escalation_rate.description: Percentage of tickets that were escalated
